item.text: I have read the information in this consent form including risks and possible benefits. All my questions about the research have been answered to my satisfaction. I understand that I and my child are free to withdraw at any time without penalty or loss of benefits to which we are otherwise entitled.
Please indicate if you DO NOT wish to have your child provide a saliva sample for this study. Saliva samples will be stored and later analyzed for genetic data.
I DO NOT WISH TO HAVE MY CHILD PROVIDE A SALIVA SAMPLE FOR THIS STUDY.
Please indicate if you DO NOT wish to have your child wear a Fitbit™ for this study.
I DO NOT WISH TO HAVE MY CHILD WEAR A FITBIT™ FOR THIS STUDY.
Please indicate if you DO NOT wish to be contacted with additional questionnaires about your child for this study.
I DO NOT WISH TO BE CONTACTED WITH ADDITIONAL QUESTIONNAIRES ABOUT MY CHILD FOR THIS STUDY.
I agree to my child’s participation in the study.
